verses.verse: And Adam <S%H120><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> Eve <S%H2332><s%> his wife <S%H802><s%>; and she conceived <S%H2029><s%>, and gave birth to <S%H3205><s%> Cain <S%H7014><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, I have gotten <S%H7069><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> from <S%H854><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

And she again <S%H3254><s%> gave birth to <S%H3205><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%> Abel <S%H1893><s%>. And Abel <S%H1893><s%> was a keeper <S%H7462><s%> of sheep <S%H6629><s%>, but Cain <S%H7014><s%> was a tiller <S%H5647><s%> of the ground <S%H127><s%>.

And in process <S%H7093><s%> of time <S%H3117><s%> it came to pass <S%H7014><s%>, that Cain brought <S%H935><s%> of the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of the ground <S%H127><s%> an offering <S%H4503><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

And Abel <S%H1893><s%>, he <S%H1931><s%> also brought <S%H935><s%> of the firstborn <S%H1062><s%> of his flock <S%H6629><s%> and of the fat <S%H2459><s%> there <S%H3068><s%>. And the Lord had respect <S%H8159><s%> unto Abel <S%H1893><s%> and to his offering <S%H4503><s%>:

But unto Cain <S%H7014><s%> and to his offering <S%H4503><s%> he had not respect <S%H8159><s%>. And Cain <S%H7014><s%> was very <S%H3966><s%> angry <S%H2734><s%>, and his face <S%H6440><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%>.
And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Cain <S%H7014><s%>, Why are you angry <S%H2734><s%>? And why is your face <S%H6440><s%> fallen <S%H5307><s%>?

If <S%H518><s%> you do well <S%H3190><s%>, shall you not be accepted <S%H7613><s%>? And if you do not well <S%H3190><s%>, sin <S%H2403><s%> crouches <S%H7257><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%>. And to you shall be his desire <S%H8669><s%>, but you shall rule over him <S%H4910><s%>.

And Cain <S%H7014><s%> talked <S%H559><s%> with <S%H413><s%> Abel <S%H1893><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%>: and it came to pass <S%H7704><s%>, when they were in the field, that Cain <S%H7014><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%> against <S%H413><s%> Abel <S%H1893><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%>, and killed him <S%H2026><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Cain <S%H7014><s%>, Where <S%H335><s%> is Abel <S%H1893><s%> your brother <S%H251><s%>? And he said <S%H559><s%>, I know <S%H3045><s%> not <S%H251><s%>: Am I my brother's keeper <S%H8104><s%>?

And he said <S%H559><s%>, What <S%H4100><s%> have you done <S%H6213><s%>? The voice <S%H6963><s%> of your brother <S%H251><s%>'s blood <S%H1818><s%> cries <S%H6817><s%> unto me from the ground <S%H127><s%>.

And now are you cursed <S%H779><s%> from the earth <S%H127><s%>, which has opened <S%H6475><s%> her mouth <S%H6310><s%> to receive <S%H3947><s%> your brother <S%H251><s%>'s blood <S%H1818><s%> from your hand <S%H3027><s%>;

When <S%H3588><s%> you till <S%H5647><s%> the ground <S%H127><s%>, it shall not henceforth <S%H3254><s%> yield <S%H5414><s%> unto you her strength <S%H3581><s%>; a fugitive <S%H5128><s%> and a vagabond <S%H5110><s%> shall you be in the earth <S%H776><s%>.
And Cain <S%H7014><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, My punishment <S%H5771><s%> is greater <S%H1419><s%> than I can carry <S%H5375><s%>.

Behold <S%H1644><s%>, you have driven me out this day <S%H3117><s%> from the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth <S%H127><s%>; and from <S%H5921><s%> your face <S%H6440><s%> shall I be hidden <S%H5641><s%>; and I shall be a fugitive <S%H5128><s%> and a vagabond <S%H5110><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%>; and it shall come to pass <S%H1961><s%>, that every one that finds me <S%H4672><s%> shall kill me <S%H2026><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him <S%H3651><s%>, Therefore whoever slays <S%H2026><s%> Cain <S%H7014><s%>, vengeance shall be taken <S%H5358><s%> on him sevenfold <S%H7659><s%>. And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> a mark <S%H226><s%> upon Cain <S%H7014><s%>, lest <S%H1115><s%> any finding <S%H4672><s%> him should kill him <S%H5221><s%>.

And Cain <S%H7014><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> from the presence <S%H6440><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and lived <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Nod <S%H5113><s%>, on the east <S%H6926><s%> of Eden <S%H5731><s%>.

And Cain <S%H7014><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> his wife <S%H802><s%>; and she conceived <S%H2029><s%>, and bore <S%H3205><s%> Enoch <S%H2585><s%>: and he built <S%H1129><s%> a city <S%H5892><s%>, and called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%>, after the name <S%H8034><s%> of his son <S%H1121><s%>, Enoch <S%H2585><s%>.

And unto Enoch <S%H2585><s%> was born <S%H3205><s%> Irad <S%H5897><s%>: and Irad <S%H5897><s%> fathered <S%H3205><s%> Mehujael <S%H4232><s%>: and Mehujael <S%H4232><s%> fathered <S%H3205><s%> Methusael <S%H4967><s%>: and Methusael <S%H4967><s%> fathered <S%H3205><s%> Lamech <S%H3929><s%>.

And Lamech <S%H3929><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> unto him two <S%H8147><s%> wives <S%H802><s%>: the name <S%H8034><s%> of the one <S%H259><s%> was Adah <S%H5711><s%>, and the name <S%H8034><s%> of the other <S%H8145><s%> Zillah <S%H6741><s%>.
And Adah <S%H5711><s%> gave birth to <S%H3205><s%> Jabal <S%H2989><s%>: he was the father <S%H1><s%> of such as live <S%H3427><s%> in tents <S%H168><s%>, and of such as have cattle <S%H4735><s%>.
And his brother <S%H251><s%>'s name <S%H8034><s%> was Jubal <S%H3106><s%>: he was the father <S%H1><s%> of all such as handle <S%H8610><s%> the harp <S%H3658><s%> and organ <S%H5748><s%>.

And Zillah <S%H6741><s%>, she also gave birth to <S%H3205><s%> Tubal <S%H8423><s%>–cain, a instructer <S%H3913><s%> of every artificer <S%H2794><s%> in brass <S%H5178><s%> and iron <S%H1270><s%>: and the sister <S%H269><s%> of Tubal <S%H8423><s%>–cain was Naamah <S%H5279><s%>.

And Lamech <S%H3929><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto his wives <S%H802><s%>, Adah <S%H5711><s%> and Zillah <S%H6741><s%>, Hear <S%H8085><s%> my voice <S%H6963><s%>; you until <S%H5647><s%> of Lamech <S%H3929><s%>, listen <S%H238><s%> unto my speech <S%H565><s%>: for I have slain <S%H2026><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> for my wounding <S%H6482><s%>, and a young man <S%H3206><s%> for my hurt <S%H2250><s%>.
If <S%H3588><s%> Cain <S%H7014><s%> shall be avenged <S%H5358><s%> seven times <S%H7659><s%>, truly Lamech <S%H3929><s%> seventy <S%H7657><s%> and seven times <S%H7651><s%>.

And Adam <S%H120><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> his wife <S%H802><s%> again <S%H5750><s%>; and she gave birth to <S%H3205><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%>, and called <S%H7121><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Seth <S%H8352><s%>: For God <S%H430><s%>, said she <S%H7896><s%>, has appointed me another <S%H312><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%> instead <S%H8478><s%> of Abel <S%H1893><s%>, whom <S%H3588><s%> Cain <S%H7014><s%> killed <S%H2026><s%>.

And to Seth <S%H8352><s%>, to him <S%H1931><s%> also there was born <S%H3205><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%>; and he called <S%H7121><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Enos <S%H583><s%>: then began men <S%H2490><s%> to call <S%H7121><s%> upon the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.
